title: Activate New Debit Card
description: A customer has received their new debit card in the mail and needs to activate it.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer by verifying personal information and the card's CVV.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the customer and the card they are holding.

tasks.description: Activate the new debit card in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the card status to 'Active'.

tasks.description: Guide the customer through setting a PIN for their new card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the customer to set their PIN.
